system.availability: A Fast and portable method of holding a xenos creature for further study. Compact, and unfurling to a flat, circular plate that can hold anything of Size 7 (Massive) or smaller that does not possess the Incorporeal Trait for up to 5 hours if using a Battery pack, or indefinitely if connected to a power source. Creatures within cannot take any actions or otherwise interact with anything outside. Once active it hoverrs two metres off of the ground and can then be pushed or towed as needed.
